availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph H. Totten (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Davis Totten in October 1810. Father of David Totten. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Garrard County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 773.
Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880, NARA Microfilm Publication, T655, Record Group Number 15, p. 462.
"Joseph Hicks Totten (1791-18704)," Find A Grave, Memorial #32595850, accessed November 04, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85651259.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, 1797-1861, Film #000183256, p. 93.
KYR-0001-020-1595.
